sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GIS_ASSETS_CD_F ( GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, GIS_ASSETS_RM, REG_USR, REGISTDT, UPD_USR, UPDTDT, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD, GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, ERP_ASSETS_NO, ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#, #gisAssetsSubCd#, #gisAssetsCd#, #gisAssetsNm#, #gisAssetsMngDeptCd#, #gisAssetsOperDeptCd#, #gisAssetsLocplc#, #gisAssetsLnm#, #gisAssetsLnmSub#, #gisAssetsAr#, #gisAssetsUsageYn#, #gisAssetsAcqPri#, #gisAssetsStndrd#, #gisAssetsBlddate#, #gisAssetsBldDt#, #gisAssetsRm#, #regUsr#, #registdt#, #updUsr#, #updtdt#, #gisAssetsQuayGroupCd#, #gisAssetsLocCd#, #gisAssetsSeCd#, #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#, #gisAssetsInvstmntMthd#, #gisAssetsGisCd#, #gisAssetsRealRentAr#, #drwLstRegistYear#, #drwLstSeq#, #gisAssetsValAmt#, #gisAssetsValInqireDt#, #erpAssetsSeCd#, #erpAssetsNo#, #erpAssetsNoSeq#, #erpAssetsDisuseRegistYn#, #erpAssetsDisuseRsn#, #gisAssetsQuayCd# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_ASSETS_CD_F SET ID=#id# , NAME=#name# , DESCRIPTION=#description# , USE_YN=#useYn# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, GIS_ASSETS_RM, REG_USR, REGISTDT, UPD_USR, UPDTDT, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD, GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, ERP_ASSETS_NO, ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, GIS_ASSETS_RM, REG_USR, REGISTDT, UPD_USR, UPDTDT, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD, GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, ERP_ASSETS_NO, ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD=#searchErpAssetsSeCd#
ERP_ASSETS_NO=#searchErpAssetsNo#
ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=#searchErpAssetsNoSeq#
ORDER BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
